ValidationRule.description: If the associated account is of Mexican and Tax ID on the associated Account is not null and Tax ID of the associated account is available on the 'MX Non-Compliant Taxpayers' object and Opportunity Stage is either 'Purchase' or past 'Purchase' stage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Account.BillingCountry ='Mexico', Account.MX_Non_Compliant_Tax_Payer__c = True, Probability >= 0.9, NOT(ISPICKVAL(MX_Approval_status__c,"Approved" )), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Revenue Opportunity"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The RFC # for this account requires approval before the opportunity can move to any future stages. Please click the "Initiate RFC Approval" button to initiate the approval process. You will receive an email notification when the opportunity is approved.
